run_ls¶

tessilator.lc_analysis.run_ls(cln, p_min_thresh=0.05, p_max_thresh=100.0, samples_per_peak=10)[source]¶

Run Lomb-Scargle periodogram and return a dictionary of results.

Parameters:
clndict

A dictionary containing the lightcurve data. The keys must include | “time0” -> The time coordinate relative to the first data point | “nflux” -> The detrended, cleaned, normalised flux values

p_min_threshfloat, optional, default=0.05

The minimum period (in days) to be calculated.

p_max_threshfloat, optional, default=100.

The maximum period (in days) to be calculated.

samples_per_peakint, optional, default=10

The number of samples to measure in each periodogram peak.

Returns:
LS_dictdict

A dictionary of parameters calculated from the periodogram analysis
